channel.title: Problems with Vista? Really?
channel.description:
Alright so i have been using vista for a few months. The only major problems i have found are with freezing programs, and that only happens like once a month.
Some of you have been seriously ripping on Vista, so my question is What is the problem?
Most of the Vista haters HAVE NEVER EVEN USED IT. Your all mac people just hopping on the bandwagon of hating vista for reasons you dont even have or ever expierienced. So for the users who DO have vista, what are some problems you have had?

item.title: Problems with Vista? Really?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

[quote=“Kihomura, post:16, topic:286410”][quote author=Newty link=topic=378773.msg2849545#msg2849545 date=1246465319]
Vista is a RAM eater. It also super bogs down internet speed. Windows 7 is such a nice upgrade, I really do suggest getting it. (it’s free)
[/quote]
And on top of that, it’s fucking sexy.[/quote]
It really is, I’ve never seen an OS laid out so nice. Pretty, yet convieniant.

Read full topic

item.title: Problems with Vista? Really?
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

Process hog. If all you’re going to base an OS’ performance on is what you’ve seen running your RuneScape private server or browsing the internet, you might as well use a Mac.

Read full topic

item.title: Problems with Vista? Really?
item.dc:creator: @_Jake2 `Jake
item.description:
@_Jake2 wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:20, topic:286410”]Kihomura, that happens on XP too.

I’ve noticed that Vista is terribly slow and you need atleast 2 gigs of RAM. It also has a compatibility issue with some forms of EXE compression (Take the Game Maker 6 ones for example). And like you said, programs freeze.[/quote]

Like I said before in my other post I don’t have any problems with Vista, and I only have 1 gig of ram.

Read full topic

item.title: Problems with Vista? Really?
item.dc:creator: @jjones10 jjones10
item.description:
@jjones10 wrote:

Well all those problems happen on any system. So why does everyone pick on Vista saying its the worst?

Read full topic

item.title: Problems with Vista? Really?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Kihomura, that happens on XP too.

I’ve noticed that Vista is terribly slow and you need atleast 2 gigs of RAM. It also has a compatibility issue with some forms of EXE compression (Take the Game Maker 6 ones for example). And like you said, programs freeze.

Read full topic

item.title: Problems with Vista? Really?
item.dc:creator: @_Jake2 `Jake
item.description:
@_Jake2 wrote:

I have never ever had a problem with my Vista and I am not just saying that. It has always ran very efficient and completely fine. I have Vista Business.

Read full topic

Windows 7 is such a nice upgrade, I really do suggest getting it. (it’s free)

I’m looking forward to it.

item.title: Problems with Vista? Really?
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:7, topic:286410”]Macs suck.

Vista uses half your RAM to run the fkn OS.[/quote]

But its better to use up all your RAM or then there is no point of having it. If a lot of RAM is used it should make some things better and quicker!! However since it is Windows, it wont.

Macs are for those who simply cant operate a normal computer, and Snobs.

Read full topic

item.title: Problems with Vista? Really?
item.dc:creator: @shane11 shane11
item.description:
@shane11 wrote:

Yeah, it works great at times, I’m not complaining. It might not be worth what I payed for it but it is nice. I do agree with you too, people gripe on Vista, just because maybe one of the more respected people on these forums don’t like it. I like the Vista theme to, the dark, and all that. It looks cool.

Read full topic

item.title: Problems with Vista? Really?
item.dc:creator: @jjones10 jjones10
item.description:
@jjones10 wrote:

Sounds to me like you just have an inadequate computer for running vista…

But it has good features right?? Like the search feature is amazing. especially for runescape private servers. Open up your server files, search a keyword, and within seconds you have every file that that word is listed on.

Read full topic

item.title: Problems with Vista? Really?
item.dc:creator: @shane11 shane11
item.description:
@shane11 wrote:

Well, I have a vista, I don’t know which version, but it freezes at least 3 times a day, since I got it. It’s fast, but will run slow with 3 or 4 programs running, or a website like Myspace open. But I still like mine.

Read full topic
